AzurePolicyName: Microsoft Managed Control 1000 - Access Control Policy And Procedures
Microsoft Managed Control 1001 - Access Control Policy And Procedures
A maximum of 3 owners should be designated for your subscription
An Azure Active Directory administrator should be provisioned for SQL servers
Audit usage of custom RBAC rules
Cognitive Services accounts should have local authentication methods disabled
Deprecated accounts should be removed from your subscription
Deprecated accounts with owner permissions should be removed from your subscription

Managed identity should be used in your API App
Managed identity should be used in your Function App
Managed identity should be used in your Web App

Storage accounts should be migrated to new Azure Resource Manager resources
Virtual machines should be migrated to new Azure Resource Manager resources
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) should be used on Kubernetes Services
Adaptive network hardening recommendations should be applied on internet facing virtual machines

App Configuration should use private link
